history.proof: intros s c H_step H_held H_now_occurred_InputUnlock. unfold now, next in H_now_occurred_InputUnlock. unfold nwState, nwPackets, hd. simpl. shelve.

ctx: intros s c H_step H_held H_now_occurred_InputUnlock.
intros s c H_step H_held H_now_occurred_InputUnlock.
intros s c H_step H_held H_now_occurred_InputUnlock.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) c : Client_index H_step : lb_step_execution lb_step_async s H_held : held (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) (Client c)) = true H_now_occurred_InputUnlock : match s with | Cons x _ => occurred (InputUnlock c) x end Unable to unify "held (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) (Client c)) = true" with "next (fun s : infseq (event network Label (Name * (Input + list Output))) => In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (let (nwPackets, _) := evt_a match s with | Cons x _ => x end in nwPackets)) s".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))) (c : Client_index), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> held (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) (Client c)) = true -> now (occurred (InputUnlock c)) s -> next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0)))) s

Premises:
now : forall T : Type, (T -> Prop) -> infseq T -> Prop
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
next : forall T : Type, (infseq T -> Prop) -> infseq T -> Prop
Record event (A L trace : Type) : Type := Build_event { evt_a : A; evt_l : L; evt_trace : list trace } Arguments event (_ _ _)%type_scope Arguments Build_event [A L trace]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope
hd : forall T : Type, infseq T -> T
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pDst {P params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
evt_a : forall A L trace : Type, event A L trace -> A
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
CoInductive infseq (T : Type) : Type := Cons : T -> infseq T -> infseq T Arguments infseq _%type_scope Arguments Cons [T]%type_scope
occurred : forall A L trace : Type, L -> event A L trace -> Prop

input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pSrc {P params}
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
held = fun d : Data => let (_, held) := d in held : Data -> bool
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
label = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, _, _) := LabeledMultiParams0 in label : forall P : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams P -> Type Arguments label {P LabeledMultiParams}
Inductive Label : Type := InputLock : Client_index -> Label | InputUnlock : Client_index -> Label | MsgUnlock : Label | MsgLock : Client_index -> Label | MsgLocked : Client_index -> Label | Nop : Label | Silent : Label

Inductive lb_step_async (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation network label (name * (input + list output)) := LabeledStepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net'
MsgUnlock_moves_client : forall (n : nat) (c : Client_index) (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c -> now (occurred MsgUnlock) s -> next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) Server)) n c /\ (n = 0 -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0))))) s
